message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to move forward with.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering me, but I'm going to need to come in a bit lower. I'm willing to offer $9,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to come in a bit lower, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. Let me know if this is more in line with what you're looking for.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11,000 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $9,500.  This is my best offer, so let me know if you're willing to accept.
